title: Pearl Harbor
creator_credit: Jerry Bruckheimer Films, Touchstone Pictures, Michael Kaplan, Michael Bay, Jerry Bruckheimer, Pat Sandston, Randall Wallace, Nigel Phelps, K.C. Hodenfield, Kenny Bates, Mitzi Haralson and Jennifer Klein
brief_description: The lifelong friendship between Rafe McCawley and Danny Walker is put to the ultimate test when the two ace fighter pilots become entangled in a love triangle with beautiful Naval nurse Evelyn Johnson. But the rivalry between the friends-turned-foes is immediately put on hold when they find themselves at the center of Japan’s devastating attack on Pearl Harbor on Dec. 7, 1941.
